explanation: [0-0] In the picture, a pink cartoon character is sitting at a table covered with a pink and white checkered tablecloth. Several yellow chocolate swirl breads are placed on the table. This cartoon character, with fluffy pink hair, is smiling happily, holding a swirl bread in his hand. Behind it is a pink fan background.

[0-6] As the video begins, the cartoon character pinches the bread hard, causing the chocolate inside to spray into its mouth. It puts the hollow bread aside, eyes narrowed to slits, looking very satisfied. As it eats the second one, another similar pink cartoon character approaches from the left side of the video, picks up the hollow bread, and shakes its head angrily.
